galleryOne.title: The Palio
galleryOne.description: Sienaâ€™s central piazza known as Il Campo, is famous for the Palio. A horse race run around the piazza every summer.

galleryOne.title: The Queen's Plate
galleryOne.description: The Queen's Plate is Canada's oldest thoroughbred horse race, having been founded in 1860. It is also the oldest continuously run race in North America.

galleryOne.title: The Kentucky Derby
galleryOne.description: The Kentucky Derby is a horse race held annually in Louisville, Kentucky, United States, on the first Saturday in May, capping the two-week-long Kentucky Derby Festival.

galleryOne.title: The Preakness
galleryOne.description: The Preakness Stakes is an American flat thoroughbred horse race held on the third Saturday in May each year at Pimlico Race Course in Baltimore, Maryland.

galleryOne.title: The Grand National
galleryOne.description: The Grand National is a National Hunt horse race held annually at Aintree Racecourse near Liverpool, England.
